short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search On YouTube directly from your Chrome homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoid YouTube Home Screen.

To help improve focus while studying, This Add-on allows searching on YouTube without having to view the YouTube home screen. This way, you can avoid distractions and stay on track.
